trans-unit.source: Identifies a container control that creates a new ID namespace within a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> object's control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 識別在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> 物件的控制項階層架構內建立新 ID 命名空間的容器控制項。

trans-unit.source: This is a marker interface only.
Any control that implements this interface creates a new namespace in which all child control ID attributes are guaranteed to be unique within an entire application.
trans-unit.target: 實作此介面的任何控制項建立新的命名空間，所有子控制項的 ID 屬性都保證整個應用程式內是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: The marker provided by this interface allows unique naming of the dynamically generated server control instances within the Web server controls that support data binding.
trans-unit.target: 此介面所提供的標記可讓您以動態方式產生的伺服器控制項中的執行個體支援資料繫結的 Web 伺服器控制項的唯一命名。

trans-unit.source: These controls include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> controls.
When you develop templated controls, you should implement this interface to avoid naming conflicts on a page.
trans-unit.target: 當您開發樣板化控制項時，您應該實作這個介面，以避免命名衝突，在頁面上。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Control Designers Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1d5a99d7-0a72-403e-812e-2c1ab595c810).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 控制項設計工具概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1d5a99d7-0a72-403e-812e-2c1ab595c810)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a templated custom server control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作自訂樣板化的伺服器控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>介面。

trans-unit.source: When this custom server control is used in an .aspx file, it will provide a unique namespace for any server controls that it contains.
trans-unit.target: .Aspx 檔案中使用這個自訂的伺服器控制項時，它會針對它所包含的任何伺服器控制項提供唯一的命名空間。
